summary: This batch represents work across multiple product teams focusing on One-Time Purchase (OTP) implementations, subscription management improvements, and product catalog enhancements. Major efforts include building OTP checkout flows, dashboards, and order confirmation pages for HelloFresh, while parallel work addresses pet food portion filtering, add-on migration, and discount communication improvements for Factor and other brands.

decisions.what: Clone existing Footer component for OTP-specific behavior rather than modifying shared component
decisions.rationale: Maintains consistency in styling and structure while adding OTP-specific redirect logic and GTM tracking without affecting subscription flows

decisions.what: Use otp_uuid presence in route for OTP detection
decisions.rationale: Simple, reliable method to distinguish OTP orders from subscription orders

decisions.what: Filter 75% portion option for calories above 226 on pet food funnels
decisions.rationale: Per PRD requirements, only 50% and 100% options should display for higher calorie products

decisions.what: Exclude specific SKUs (60, 1650, 1850) for 75% portions on dry and fresh plans
decisions.rationale: SKU compatibility analysis revealed these don't have equivalent 100% variants

decisions.what: Track jar vs packet popularity through sold items data rather than implementing new tracking
decisions.rationale: Existing sales data provides sufficient insight without additional tracking implementation

decisions.what: Mark FactorForm meal selection relic ticket as Won't Do
decisions.rationale: No longer needed based on current priorities

initiatives.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase) in Funnel
initiatives.description: Enable customers to make one-time purchases without subscription commitment, including checkout flow, order confirmation, dashboard, and product menu creation

initiatives.name: Pet Food Portion Plan Enhancements
initiatives.description: Introduce new portion percent offerings (50%, 75%, 100%) for dry and fresh pet food with proper SKU compatibility and filtering

initiatives.name: Add-on Selection Migration
initiatives.description: Migrate add-on selection calls from subscribable-addons-bff to normal cart endpoint for unified handling

initiatives.name: Discount Communication Enhancement
initiatives.description: Integrate voucher discount communication in VMS product cards through new PPS properties

initiatives.name: OTP Price Migration for VMS
initiatives.description: Calculate and migrate customer pricing for VMS users transitioning to OTP model

blockers.description: PR blocked pending approval in Slack threads for discount communication property
blockers.impact: Delays integration of voucher discounts in product cards

blockers.description: Dependency on OTP product families creation on live environment
blockers.impact: Cannot create menus for OTP customers until product families exist

blockers.description: Issue not reproducible for reactivation-bff implementation
blockers.impact: Uncertainty about whether fix is needed or problem exists

entities.context: Needs to assign product for OTP menu creation and handle product family setup

entities.context: Product owner providing clarifications and flagging issues across multiple tickets

entities.context: Customer Communication Management system where OTP menus need to be created

entities.name: NextJS
entities.context: Framework used for creating OTP dashboard page

entities.name: reactivation-bff
entities.context: Backend service requiring new attributes for cadence_start_week and delivery_day

entities.name: subscribable-addons-bff
entities.context: Current endpoint for add-on subscriptions being migrated to cart endpoint

entities.name: PPS
entities.context: Product Pricing Service needing new properties for discount communication

entities.name: Factor
entities.context: Brand with FactorForm requiring meal selection updates and post-launch support

entities.name: Anatta
entities.context: Team providing post-launch support fixes for Factor Form

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Feature flag and analytics platform for tracking checkout events and F4L feature cleanup

entities.name: GTM
entities.context: Google Tag Manager for tracking OTP-specific events

entities.name: Lydia
entities.context: Provided tracking definitions for card selector interactions

technical_patterns.context: Creating OTPFooter by cloning existing Footer maintains consistency while enabling OTP-specific behavior without affecting shared components

technical_patterns.pattern: Route-based feature detection using UUID parameters
technical_patterns.context: Using otp_uuid in route for OTP detection provides simple, reliable differentiation between order types
useOrderConfirmationData and useCustomerOneTimeOrder hooks transform order items for UI display, separating data fetching from presentation logic

technical_patterns.pattern: Conditional polling based on order type
technical_patterns.context: Skipping subscription polling for OTP orders optimizes performance by avoiding unnecessary API calls
Migrating from subscribable-addons-bff to cart endpoint reduces system complexity and unifies add-on handling
Removing F4L feature flag after stable rollout reduces technical debt and simplifies codebase

technical_patterns.pattern: SKU compatibility analysis for new offerings
technical_patterns.context: Analyzing SKU equivalents across portion percentages ensures valid product combinations in change plan flows
Adding missing Statsig and tracking events to OTP checkout ensures consistent monitoring across subscription and OTP flows

work_themes: Product catalog filtering and SKU compatibility
Technical debt reduction and feature flag cleanup

dependencies.context: OTP menus cannot be created until product families are set up on live environment
UI components depend on data transformation from backend hooks
New attributes (cadence_start_week, delivery_day) must be passed to backend service
Frontend must migrate from subscribable-addons-bff to unified cart endpoint
Discount communication requires new properties from PPS
Analytics and feature flagging depend on proper event instrumentation
UI must respect SKU availability for different portion percentages
